docs.snippet: Save for those who have commercial interests with that country known as the Argentine Republic, it may be generally stated that very few of our people have any acquaintance with it. If our knowledge of these important South American States was...
docs.lead_paragraph: Save for those who have commercial interests with that country known as the Argentine Republic, it may be generally stated that very few of our people have any acquaintance with it. If our knowledge of these important South American States was general our business relationships with them would be more extended. Not only
docs.abstract: Clemens, E. J. M.; "La Plata Countries of South America"

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Aug. 18.--As the President of the republic was entering the theatre last night a miscreant fired a revolver almost point blank at his head. The ball entered the President's cheek, inflicting a slight wound. An infuriated crowd attacked...
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Aug. 18.--As the President of the republic was entering the theatre last night a miscreant fired a revolver almost point blank at his head. The ball entered the President's cheek, inflicting a slight wound. An infuriated crowd attacked the would-be assassin and maltreated him so terribly that he died soon afterward.

headline.main: AN ASSASSIN'S BULLET.; THE PRESIDENT OF URUGUAY WOUNDED WHILE ENTERING A THEATRE.

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Aug. 29, via Galveston.--President Santos has requested the legal authorities to suspend their investigations into the matter of the recent assault upon him, and to set at liberty the persons detained for supposed connection with...
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Aug. 29, via Galveston.--President Santos has requested the legal authorities to suspend their investigations into the matter of the recent assault upon him, and to set at liberty the persons detained for supposed connection with the outrage. None of the persons so detained have been found guilty of complicity in the assault on the President.

docs.lead_paragraph: BERLIN, Sept. 4.--The Catholic question again threatens to become acute under the concurrent declaration of the conference of Bishops at Fulda and the congress at Breslau. Baron Heeremann, in opening the congress, asserted the right of the church to absolute liberty in directing religious orders, including that of the...

headline.main: NEWS FROM FATHERLAND.; THE CATHOLIC QUESTION AGAIN AROUSING ATTENTION.

docs.snippet: BUENOS AYRES, Nov. 3, via Galveston.-- The republic of Uruguay is apparently passing through a political crisis. It is reported that President Santos is irritated because his Ministers, Senors Herrana, Tortega, Terra, and Herez, have resigned,...
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AYRES, Nov. 3, via Galveston.-- The republic of Uruguay is apparently passing through a political crisis. It is reported that President Santos is irritated because his Ministers, Senors Herrana, Tortega, Terra, and Herez, have resigned, refusing to sign a stringent law against the press.
docs.abstract: Political Crisis; President Santos Asked to Resign

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Nov. 21.--The annual report of Postmaster-General Vilas is a long document, giving in detail and with many statistical tables the operations of the department for the last fiscal year.
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Nov. 21.--The annual report of Postmaster-General Vilas is a long document, giving in detail and with many statistical tables the operations of the department for the last fiscal year.

headline.main: WORK OF THE POST OFFICE; ANNUAL REPORT OF POSTMASTER-GENERAL VILAS. A GRATIFYING STATEMENT OF THE LAST YEARS FINANCES--SOME IMPORTANT CHANGES RECOMMENDED.

docs.snippet: Thomas J. Jarvis, United States Minister to Brazil, arrived in this city yesterday, having sailed from Rio de Janeiro on Nov. 10. At the Grants Central Hotel last evening he and his wife, who accompanies him on his visit to this country, chatted...
docs.lead_paragraph: Thomas J. Jarvis, United States Minister to Brazil, arrived in this city yesterday, having sailed from Rio de Janeiro on Nov. 10. At the Grants Central Hotel last evening he and his wife, who accompanies him on his visit to this country, chatted pleasantly of their past two years' life in the capital of the great South American empire.
docs.abstract: South American Cities, Especially Buenos Ayres and Rio de Janeiro; Minister Jarvis on Quarantine Protection

headline.main: CHOLERA IN BUENOS AYRES.; MINISTER JARVIS, FROM BRAZIL, HAS NO FEAR OF ITS NORTHWARD MARCH.
